_Table 1: Number of deaths by place of death_
```{r table1}
read_csv(here::here("output", "os_reports", "eol_service", "deaths_month.csv")) %>%
  mutate(start_date = as_date(cut(study_month, breaks = "3 months"))
         , end_date = rollback(start_date + months(3))
         , time_period = paste0(format(start_date, format = "%b-%y"), " - ", format(end_date, format = "%b-%y"))) %>%
  group_by(time_period, start_date, end_date, pod_ons_new) %>%
  summarise(count = sum(count, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = pod_ons_new, values_from = count) %>%
  arrange(start_date)

```
